title: CROSSED - BADLANDS 040 (2013) (AVATAR) (4 Covers) (Darkness-Empi
description:
CROSSED: BADLANDS #40

Writer: David Hine
Artist: German Erramouspe

Mature Readers, Color, 32 pages
Price: $3.99 US
In Stores October 30, 2013

Horror master DAVID HINE returns to Crossed: Badlands to tell a story set on day one of the outbreak Ã¢â‚¬â€œ in Japan!

Three college students abroad in Japan are visiting a sacred temple for very different reasons. But they soon find that on C-Day, enlightenment only comes in the form of homicidal misery from the fast spreading disease. And an introverted female manga artist discovers that the nightmares she draws on paper are nothing compared to the vile misery of the Crossed.

There is no hope. There is no help. There is only the Crossed.

Available with Regular, Torture, Wraparound, and special Red Crossed Incentive covers.
